    • Method Detail

      • validateMoney

        public long validateMoney(java.lang.String dollarAmount)
                   throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Check a user input representing money and convert to a long representing the value in cents
        Parameters:
        dollarAmount - The entered amount of money
        Returns:
        the amount of money in cents
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if: - The string cannot be converted to a BigDecimal - The value is negative - The value contains more than 2 decimal digits - The value is too large to fit in a long

      • submitNewRequest

        public int submitNewRequest(int submitterID,
                            java.lang.String amount,
                            java.lang.String category,
                            java.lang.String description)
                     throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Add a new reimbursement request
        Parameters:
        submitterID - The user id belonging to the user submitting the request
        amount - The new request's amount
        category - The new request's category
        description - The new request's description
        Returns:
        a generated request id if successfully added, or -1 if not
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if any provided input values are invalid

      • resolveRequest

        public boolean resolveRequest(int resolverID,
                              int requestID,
                              boolean approved)
        Approve or deny a pending reimbursement request
        Parameters:
        resolverID - The user id of the manager resolving the request
        requestID - The request id of the request to update
        approved - True if the request is approved, false if the request is denied
        Returns:
        True if the request was successfully updated, false otherwise

      • viewRequest

        public ReimbursementRequest viewRequest(int requestID)
        Get a reimbursement request by id
        Parameters:
        requestID - The request id
        Returns:
        the reimbursement request if found, null otherwise

        userID - The user id of the user submitting the requests
        Returns:
